rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: The entrance hall is designed to welcome visitors and align with Vastu principles by ensuring that the entry door faces north-east for positive energy. It includes eco-friendly materials such as bamboo flooring and recycled wood.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: The living room is spacious and serves as the main gathering area. Large windows are placed on the east and north sides to maximize natural light while maintaining privacy. Eco-friendly insulation materials are used.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room with access to a small kitchenette for informal meals. The design ensures a fluid transition between dining and living spaces, aligned with Vastu principles by having the dining area in the southeast corner.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Located in the east quadrant to ensure a calm environment. The master bedroom features large windows on the north side for morning sunlight, and eco-friendly building materials are used.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Positioned in the west quadrant of the ground floor to balance energy flow. The room is designed with sound insulation for guest comfort and uses sustainable materials.

rooms.name: Children's Bedrooms
rooms.description: Two adjoining rooms on the northeast side provide a secure environment for children. Designed in compliance with Vastu principles to foster creativity and safety.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Placed in the southeast corner as per Vastu recommendations. The kitchen features energy-efficient appliances and uses recycled tiles for sustainability.

rooms.name: Servants' Quarters
rooms.description: A dedicated space located in the northwest quadrant of the ground floor to support domestic staff. The design ensures ease of access while maintaining separation from main living areas.

rooms.name: Guest Toilet
rooms.description: Located near the entrance for convenient use by visitors, designed with water-saving fixtures and energy-efficient lighting.

openings.description: The main entrance is designed to welcome positive energy in accordance with Vastu principles.
Large windows ensure ample natural light while maintaining privacy and energy efficiency.
Eco-friendly doors with sound insulation for comfort.

rooms.name: Home Theater
rooms.description: Dedicated space designed on the west-facing side to minimize light interference while providing a cinematic experience. It includes energy-efficient audio-visual equipment.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: Located in the northwest area of the first floor for privacy and minimal noise disturbance to other areas. The design incorporates sustainable flooring and ventilation systems.

rooms.name: Additional Bedroom (5th bedroom)
rooms.description: A well-ventilated room on the east side of the first floor designed for guests or extended family. Eco-friendly materials and natural light are incorporated.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Shared bathroom facilities on the first floor with water-efficient fixtures and eco-friendly tiles.
